description: Bringin' Out BrennanAs we all know, our little trooper Tuffy has already had his taste of the other side in Rear Formation: Bareback Attack! Being a known veteran to the sport, Tuffy doesn't seem as gentle and loving, but that's his style. But Brennan is obviously pleased with what he's getting because he's really getting into the reciprocation as much as he was in doing the deed. And not one to ever be outdone in anything (maybe it's that short man's complex) Tuffy gets down to the business of getting his buddy off and that he does.Watching Brennan as he really gets into watching Tuffy service him is yet another priceless moment. title: Brennan & Tuffy
